applet_name: Google Drive Camera
applet_description: Create a camera widget on your phone for snapping photos directly to the folder of your choice. Great for quickly capturing receipts, reminders, and events. This Applet requires the IFTTT app. Learn more about widgets: https://ifttt.com/help/applets-with-widgets

applet_name: Upload photos to Google Drive
applet_description: Upload photos to Google Drive

applet_name: Remote download to Google Drive
applet_description: Send an email to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com with an attachment or a file link in the message body. Optionally rename the file by entering the file name in the subject.

applet_name: [ACCV2] Shutdown computer (Google Drive)
applet_description: function to turn off the pc by google assistant

applet_name: All new iOS Photos to Google Drive
applet_description: All new iOS Photos to Google Drive

applet_name: Save your Instagrams to Google Drive
applet_description: Automatically save your photos to a folder. Keep in mind, it only works for new photos you post.

applet_name: [ACC] Restart computer (Google Drive)
applet_description:
Restart your computer(s) using Amazon Alexa.
Requires AssistantComputerControl, https://assistantcomputercontrol.com/

applet_name: Automatically upload your Camera Roll to Google Drive
applet_description: Automatically upload your Camera Roll to Google Drive

applet_name: Automatically sync new files added to Dropbox to your Google Drive
applet_description: Whenever a new file is added to a Dropbox folder you select it will be automatically uploaded to Google Drive. Keep everything in sync!

applet_name: Download NASA Image of the Day
applet_description: Download NASA Image of the Day
applet_Trigger: Image of the day by NASA

applet_name: New file in Google Drive Folder
applet_description: This app will send you a email every time someone add a file into the folder

applet_name: Upload photos to Google Drive using Telegram
applet_description: Send a photo to the @IFTTT bot on Telegram to save it on Google Drive. Great for poor network conditions - chances are it'll be much easier to send a pic via Telegram rather than uploading it to GDrive :)

applet_name: Works: Pocket to PDF in Google Drive
applet_description: Save archieved Pocket Articles as PDF in Google Drive

applet_name: Download a liked file from YouTube to GoogleDrive
applet_description: Download a liked file from YouTube to GoogleDrive

applet_name: Facebook Tag to Google Drive
applet_description: Tagged Photos automatically saved to Google Drive/Photos/Facebook

applet_name: Saved Reddit posts with images get uploaded to Google Drive
applet_description: This uploads all images from saved posts to a Google drive folder under IFTTT/reddit/saved-images.

applet_name: Email New Google Drive File
applet_description: Email New Google Drive File

applet_name: Sync Google Drive with Dropbox
applet_description:
Whenever a new file is added to Google Drive, then it will be uploaded to Dropbox.
Customize the trigger to specify which Google Drive folder you would like to pull files from.

applet_name: Upload Android screenshots to Google Drive
applet_description: Upload Android screenshots to Google Drive

applet_name: Sync Pocket with Google Drive
applet_description: Sync Pocket with Google Drive

applet_name: Download new songs you like to Google Drive
applet_description: Automatically download new songs you like on SoundCloud directly to Google Drive. *Note* this works only on tracks that are publicly available for download.

applet_name: Add each favorite article as PDF to Google Drive
applet_description: Add each favorite article as PDF to Google Drive

applet_name: [Strava] - New sports activity + upload GPX file to Google Drive
applet_description: Every sport activity recorded in Strava will be saved in .GPX file in a Google Drive folder

applet_description: Instagram Video to Google Drive

applet_name: documentos a telegram
applet_description: documentos a telegram

applet_name: Save youtube videos
applet_description: saved youtube videos to google drive.

applet_name: If phone call answered then upload call to Google drive
applet_description: If any phone call is answered from an android device then upload the call to google drive

applet_name: Backup Flickr to Google Drive
applet_description: This Applet will save your Flickr photos in one place.

applet_name: Save newly added /r/Wallpapers images to Drive for ChromeCast Backdropping
applet_description: Insert a subreddit that you want the images from, and enable the "Show Drive photos and videos in your photo library" option in your Google + settings. Set the folder that you've created as the only BackDrop in your ChromeCast settings and you're done!

applet_name: Nest Cam Daily Snapshot (Time Lapse)
applet_description: You will need to find the correct URL for your Nest Cam still image. To do this make the camera public. Navigate to the URL given by Nest. View the source for that page. Find a line that starts.....

applet_name: Sell your stuff
applet_description: Keep your files up to date with the photos you need for your products that are selling.

applet_name: Subreddit Analytics
applet_description: Gives data on subreddit usage

applet_name: Stockimo Submission Backup
applet_description: Back up photos submitted to Stockimo in Google Drive

applet_name: FB page to gdrive share url
applet_description: FB page to gdrive share url

applet_name: Olli & Alli: Image Capture Log
applet_description: This applet is designed to help you keep up with the pictures your child takes. Each image that your child captures will automatically be added to your Google Drive so that you can have on-demand access. For your convenience, you will also receive a weekly digest.

applet_name: Export my paid members to Drive
applet_description:
Generates a list of your current paid Youtube members and saves it to Google Drive.

Once you've enabled this connection use this link to export your members to your Drive: https://youtube.ifttt.com/members_export

applet_name: BloomSky Timelaps to Google Drive
applet_description: Saves your Daily Timelaps to Google Drive

applet_name: Upload YouTube audio to Google Drive
applet_description: Lots of youtube videos have unimportant visuals and make great podcasts. Use this recipe to fill your Drive with podcasts from Youtube.

applet_name: Call recording saved to Google Drive
applet_description: Save your Zoom Phone call recordings to Google Drive.

applet_name: Post new Google Drive files to Slack
applet_description: Used to automatically post files from a specific Google Drive folder into a Slack channel of your choosing.
